text:
@BBCBreakfast @naga @BBCNews @BorisJohnson 
#covid19 is real. 
Close the beaches! 
Send army into large gatherings.
Issue fines. 
Save lives.
Wave 2 is coming. 
Those people on the beach some have covid & now it's passed on & now some will die. This could be your family. ☠️⚰️
#selfish #stupid
